name: SomniAMP (Demo)
description:
WARNING: While the game looks innocent, it does contain jump scares. Faint of heart beware. Don't play if you have health risks from being spooked. I know jump scares are cheap which is why The Ranger didn't have them, but this game does. *shrug*

What am I looking at?

This is a demo of a game I had been working on for the LSDJAM 2021 game jam. The goal was to make a game that's about dreams.

I've basically put two of my dreams in the game, though only one world is truly finished. Here's what the progress on the levels was:

Coconut: 90%, mostly missing polish
Coconut (bad dream): 30%
House: 20%

Gameplay

Explore dream environments that are largely based on actual dreams I had. Every dream (except the house) has a way to end it in a "good" way and a "bad" way. Ending the dream in a good way brings you to another good dream, ending it in a bad way sends you to a bad dream. Falling off the map is a way to trigger a bad dream, for example.

There are only 3 levels with only 1 bad dream.

Controls

W/A/S/D to move
Shift to run
C to crouch
Left click to use
ESC to open the menu where you can adjust mouse sensitivity
